mapper.select: select a.low_dept_no, a.set_date, a.in_time, a.out_time from set_time a join (select low_dept_no, max(set_date) as last from set_time group by low_dept_no) b on a.low_dept_no = b.low_dept_no and a.set_date = b.last order by low_dept_no asc
select low_dept_no, set_date, in_time, out_time from set_time where low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no} order by set_date desc
mapper.update: update set_time set low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}, set_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), in_time = #{in_time}, out_time = #{out_time} where set_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}
mapper.insert: insert into set_time(set_date, low_dept_no, in_time, out_time) values(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{low_dept_no}, #{in_time}, #{out_time})
